data.title: McAfee to buy database security vendor Sentrigo
data.meta_description: Reports indicate that McAfee is all set to acquire database security vendor Sentrigo for an undisclosed sum. If the acquisition comes about, it would enhance McAfee's range of products for monitoring database activity and for detecting and patching security flaws in enterprise databases. The deal is expected to close in April, when Sentrigo will become part of McAfee's Risk & Compliance business unit.
data.text:
Reports indicate that McAfee is all set to acquire database security vendor Sentrigo for an undisclosed sum.

If the acquisition comes about, it would enhance McAfee's range of products for monitoring database activity and for detecting and patching security flaws in enterprise databases.

The deal is expected to close in April, when Sentrigo will become part of McAfee's Risk & Compliance business unit.

Analysts say that the proposed Sentrigo purchase is a good move by McAfee, as they needed additional application security capabilities to go along with their endpoint, network and content security pieces.
